name: REC Designer Projects
tagline: Projects to help designers get up and running with REC
body:
### Template Boilerplate - [[Open](https://github.com/ReallyEasyCart/template-boilerplate)]

A quickstart you can use for new projects, to help setup a simple folder structure and some other useful defaults. 

To begin clone down the project like so, replacing **"my-project-name"** with your project name.

```bash
git clone -o template-boilerplate https://github.com/ReallyEasyCart/template-boilerplate.git my-project-name
```

Next you'll want to setup your own **private** repository for your template work, either on [Bitbucket](https://bitbucket.org/) (Free) or here on [Github](https://github.com/pricing) (Monthly Cost)

Once you've created your project it should give you the commands to use for and *exisiting* project to add the repository, then run: `git push -u origin master` to push back up to your own project.  

[Help contribute to this project](https://github.com/ReallyEasyCart/template-boilerplate). 

--------------------------------------

### Responsive Snippets - [[Open](https://github.com/ReallyEasyCart/responsive-snippets)]

A collection of quick snippets you can use on your REC sites. 

[Help contribute to this project](https://github.com/ReallyEasyCart/template-boilerplate). 

--------------------------------------
